SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Eddiehaven Panthers?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Eddiehaven Panthers is arc {Fosterborough Stars}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Fosterborough Stars?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Fosterborough Stars is arc {Eddiehaven Panthers}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Edwardsborough Bulls} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Eddiehaven Panthers} has the largest input flow.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 950? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {991} from {Eddiehaven Panthers} to {Edwardsborough Bulls}, a flow of {1219} from {Edwardsborough Bulls} to {Eddiehaven Panthers}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 498? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 498 and 709? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {509} from {Edwardsborough Bulls} to {Fosterborough Stars}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Fosterborough Stars to Edwardsborough Bulls or from Eddiehaven Panthers to Fosterborough Stars?
NC.A: The flow from {Eddiehaven Panthers} to {Fosterborough Stars} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Eddiehaven Panthers to Fosterborough Stars, from Edwardsborough Bulls to Fosterborough Stars, or from Edwardsborough Bulls to Eddiehaven Panthers?
NC.A: The flow from {Edwardsborough Bulls} to {Eddiehaven Panthers} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Edwardsborough Bulls}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Eddiehaven Panthers} and {Edwardsborough Bulls}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Fosterborough Stars, Arc Eddiehaven Panthers, Arc Edwardsborough Bulls}.
